price: 32. Kulligoodna iyagoo dhan Hortayadaa la keeni.
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
